markdownRemark.html: I’m a husband, a dog owner and a software developer from Córdoba, Argentina. I began my journey in tech about 6 years ago when I started studying Software Engineering at college. Since then, I haven’t stopped learning new things.

frontmatter.title: JS guide for Java developers: Part 1 — scope, closures, global context, this, and undefined
